title: The Mysterious Case Of The DNC “Bomber” (Ep 1824)
description:
In this episode, I address the increasingly mysterious case of the DNC “bomber.” 

News Picks:


Release the Tape: Revolver Has Definitive Proof FBI Is Hiding Critical Footage of Jan 6 "Pipe Bomber.”


Here’s the video link to the “bomber” video.


Aaron Rodgers Credits Psychedelic Ayahuasca Plant For 'Best Season Of My Career.’


Grand Jury Subpoenas Pat Cipollone, in Signal DOJ Is Weighing Trump Indictment.


CNN ratings collapse as network looks for 'new revenue'—including 'extending' the brand in China.

FBI Director Admits Hunter Biden Payments Could Be Part Of ‘Malign Foreign Influence’ Campaign.

Here's the Symbols the FBI Considers to Be 'Extremist'...Many Will Surprise You.


Career criminals rack up nearly 500 arrests since NY bail reform began.
